text: Area code 352 is a telephone area code in the state of Florida, United States. It covers the north-central part of Florida, including cities such as Gainesville, Ocala, and The Villages. It was created on December 3, 1995, as a split from area code 904. The mnemonic for Florida is FLA, as when typed in a keypad, it shows 352. As of March 2023, 352 is predicted to be used up by late 2027. ==References== 352
title: Area code 352
